item.title: [Writeup] HackTheBox Labs - Challenge - OnlyHacks
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step HackTheBox “OnlyHacks” challenge writeup demonstrating cross-site scripting (XSS) exploitation, session cookie theft, and practical web application enumeration in a Very Easy web challenge.
